library.fx

Class FXInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • library.fx.FXInitializer

  • public class FXInitializer
extends javafx.application.Application
    The starting point for the JavaFX GUI. Initializes the JavaFX system and starts the program.
    Author:
    Srikavin Ramkumar

      • setContent

        public void setContent(java.lang.String fxmlFile)
        This changes the center of the main window pane to the specified fxml file. If an error occurs, it is caught and an error dialog is displayed. The controller of the specified file must be defined inside the FXML and the controller must extend BaseController. The FXInitializer is set to this instance through BaseController.initialize(FXInitializer, Library)
        Parameters:
        fxmlFile - The .fxml file containing the content to display on the window.
